name: Examquestionsformultimodalinteractivesystems
0:
”Alexa, ask exam question for PMI”
”Alexa, ask exam question for interactive systems”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: exam question
des: This Alexa Skill provides exam questions for the User Experience Design (M.Sc.) master course "Prototyping Multimodal Interactive Systems" at THI (Technische Hochschule Ingolstadt). The Alexa skill was developed by Prof. Dr. Simon Nestler and only works in English.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
